conclusion: Determine position at t = 8 seconds using v-t graph and calculate displacement.
Initial position x0 = 5 m, time interval t = 0 to t = 8 seconds.
From t = 0 to t = 4 s, velocity is positive and increasing.
Calculate area under curve from t = 0 to t = 4 s: Area = 6 m.
Particle moves 6 meters in the positive direction.
From t = 4 to t = 6 s, velocity is zero.
Displacement from t = 4 to t = 6 s is 0 m.
From t = 6 to t = 8 s, velocity is negative.
Calculate area under curve from t = 6 to t = 8 s: Area = -1 m.
Particle moves 1 meter in the negative direction.
Calculate final position: x0 + net displacement = 10 m.
Position of the particle at t = 8 seconds is 10 meters.
